ygData.msgSnippet: Phobias latest ploy worked, he truly was one who could sell ice to eskimos. Lead the way my feral friend. Phobia followed with both hands on the weapon just

Phobias latest ploy worked, he truly was one who could sell ice to 
eskimos.

"Lead the way my feral friend." Phobia followed with both hands on 
the weapon just in case the predacon got any dumb ideas. "So who is 
it that I will be serving?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She saw the weapon and looked at it wide eyed. She knew that she 
had 
> to have that thing in the armory at her base.  
> "I accept your offer on behalf of the Predacons. Please join me and 
> return to my base with me."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "I've been telling you and Dark Mouse both what I want. To pledge 
> my 
> > allegiance to the Predacon cause." He knew she was trying to 
press 
> > his buttons, "But if your group couldn't use weapons like this" 
he 
> > turned the weapon to give her a better view,"then I'm sure that 
> > either the Destrucons or Maximals would appreciate the offer."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > OOC:( Common sence, most ships have autoguns and there are 
> standard 
> > > ranges for autoguns.  In otherwords, she was taking a guess as 
to 
> > the 
> > > range if the ship had guns.)
> > > 
> > > ::KitKat::
> > > 
> > > She walked a little closer, she put her hand down but didn't 
put 
> > away 
> > > the gun.  It remained in her hand.
> > > She walked close enough so that the bot on the ship could see 
her 
> > > plainly. "What is it that you want? And I'll take the credit 
for 
> > what 
> > > I want to take credit for. Now what do you want?"
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > OOC (If she doesn't know then hows she know she's out of 
range?)
> > > > 
> > > > Phobia lowers himself down the side of the ship keeping at 
> least 
> > > one 
> > > > eye on KitKats location at all times. he reaches the ground 
and 
> > > > adresses the shebott "You have nothing to fear from me, you 
can 
> > > come 
> > > > closer." He realized they must be short handed since they 
only 
> > sent 
> > > > one bot to investagate. "It would be to my disadvantage to 
harm 
> > you 
> > > > since I'm still in range of your bases autoguns. Besides why 
> > would 
> > > I 
> > > > come here to pledge my loyalty to your boss. if I were to 
harm 
> > you.-
> > > --
> > > > I'D NEVER GET THE CHANCE." His eyes remained focused on where 
> the 
> > > > ships scans showed her to be. "Now if you will radio back to 
> your 
> > > > commander you can claim credit for this encounter and leave 
> Dark 
> > > > Mouse to answer the phones."
> > > >
